document.full_text: mexican soldiers have captured a top member of the sinaloa cartel in a raid in western mexico as the government tries to chase down the gang's leader and most-wanted trafficker joaquin "shorty" guzman.
document.title: mexican army catches drug boss linked to guzman
lines_and_colors: mexican soldiers have captured a top member of the sinaloa cartel in a raid in western mexico as the government tries to chase down the gang's leader and most-wanted trafficker joaquin "shorty" guzman.
